name: .FBA File Extension
summary: Learn about .FBA files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can use Fitbit Studio (multiplatform) or the Fitbit command-line interface (multiplatform) to install an FBA file on a Fitbit smartwatch or the programs' built-in Fitbit simulator. For complete instructions, refer to Fitbit's developer documentation.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
